title: Should I work two part-time jobs while I’m going to school as a part-time student? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends in which country? It depends on the rules and regulations in the country. t also depends on how many hours you are eligible to work as part-time. Most who are into foreign language teaching and all do such things quite often. They may teach in X school on so and so days are a part-time teacher and in Y school as a part-time teacher on other days.
